name: contact-form-cli
description: CLI tool for adding contact form functionality to Next.js projects

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && echo '✨ Cleaned dist directory'
scripts.create-dirs: mkdir -p dist/templates dist/commands && echo '📁 Created dist directories'
scripts.copy-templates: echo '📝 Copying templates...' && cp -v src/templates/api.template.ts dist/templates/api.template.ts && cp -v src/templates/form.template.tsx dist/templates/form.template.tsx && echo '✅ Templates copied'
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run create-dirs && npm run compile && npm run copy-templates && echo '🎉 Build completed!'
